Each tool has unlimited usage and the same efficiency as Orichalcum tools.

name: Shadow of Grenth
description: <c=@flavor>Some say the human gods determine the fate of the seasons. Others say the gods are dead. Wear this to show your support for Grenth and endless winter.<c>

description: <c=@flavor>Some say the human gods determine the fate of the seasons. Others say the gods are dead. Wear this to show your support for Dwayna and the coming of spring.<c>
